content: if you re new to crochet try this beginner crochet scarf made super easy with self-striping red heart super easy effortless to work with you ll focus on stitch techniques while the yarn reveals gorgeous colors as you go this chunky yarn gives you great stitch definition too learn single_crochet double_crochet fringe and more you only need 2 balls to make a cozy gift-worthy scarf for anyone on your list materials red heart® super easy™ 7 oz/198 g 189 yds/173 m garden party 0001 2 balls or 345 yds/315 m measurements approximately 8 20 5 cm wide x 70 178 cm long excluding fringe
